channel.title: BUscience
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUscience, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Researchers find CRISPR is capable of even more than we thought

item.title: Rising temperatures lead to unexpectedly rapid carbon release from soils
item.description: How sensitively does organic carbon stored in soils react to changes in temperature and humidity?

item.title: Overlooked cell type orchestrates brain rewiring

item.title: One in ten asthma cases can be avoided with a better urban environment
item.description: The combination of air pollution, dense urban development and limited green spaces increases the risk of asthma in both children and adults.

item.title: Study reveals healing the ozone hole helps the Southern Ocean take up carbon
